item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - How To Get Death Knight's Longshaft Axe
item.description:
At the end of the day, only those who can survive the trials and tribulations of going up against increasingly dangerous enemies can enjoy everything Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree has to offer. While you can use Scadutree Fragments to give yourself more defensive protection, the need to eliminate your foes remains pressing, and that's where a good weapon can come in handy.

For those who love wielding a Greataxe, the DLC adds one more option in the form of the Death Knight's Longshaft Axe . It is a weapon perfect for the Tarnished who want to chop up their enemies with big swings, and this is how you can get your hands on it.

Death Knight's Longshaft Axe Overview: Stat Requirements, Effects, & Skill

A long-hafted golden axe wielded by the Death Knight.

Bears a representation of a decayed golden ring.

Crackles with lightning, the power of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

The knight, once the personal guard of Godwyn, was alos the protector of the Prince of Death's cadaver surrogate.

In Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , the Death Knight's Longshaft Axe is a new weapon of the Greataxe weapon type . Long and heavy, it allows players to extend their reach with damaging attacks, although the trade-off for speed is something that needs to be considered.

The Death Knight's Longshaft Axe can be upgraded using Smithing Stones to +10 , making it possible to deal heavy damage to all opponents.

Death Knight's Longshaft Axe Stat Requirements

STR

DEX

INT

FAITH

ARC

23

10

0

18

0

Death Knight's Longshaft Axe Attack Power & Guarded Damage Negation

Attack Power

100

Guard Boost

43

Death Knight's Longshaft Axe Weapon Skill: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe

The Death Knight's Longshaft Axe's Ash of War is Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe, which cannot be changed. This weapon skill costs 8 FP to cast.

From a low stance, the body is transformed into a bolt of lightning and charges straight ahead at fulgurous speed. Strong attack performs a lightning-charged leaping slash.

Where To Find Death Knight's Longshaft Axe

To get the Death Knight's Longshaft Axe in Shadow of the Erdtree , players will have to trek their way over to the northwest corner of the Shadow Realm and get to the Scorpion River Catacombs in Rauh Base.

Enter the dungeon and clear all opposition until you get to those familiar glowing gates. Enter and beat the Death Knight within to claim your treasure.

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - How To Get Death Knight's Twin Axes
item.description:
While there are other choices when it comes to hurting your enemies in Shadow of the Erdtree , nothing beats having a really big weapon in your corner to help even the odds against the hulking foes that call the Shadow Realm home. By mastering such weapons, you will have a much higher chance of staggering your opponents and delivering that killing blow.

In terms of the new weapons that can be obtained in the DLC, the Death Knight's Twin Axes is a solid choice that can be obtained relatively early in the game, and wielding it will give any Tarnished a chance to emerge victorious in most battles.

Death Knight's Twin Axes Overview: Stat Requirements, Effects, & Skill

Golden war axes of the Death Knight.

A pair of weapons made to be wielded in both hands.

Crackles with lightning, the power of the capital's ancient dragon cult.

The knight, once the personal guard of Godwyn, was also the protector of the Prince of Deah's cadaver surrogate.

In Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , the Death Knight's Twin Axes is a new weapon of the axe weapon type . As heavy weapons are used in both hands, it can take some getting used to the speed at which you can swing them, but getting a direct hit is going to take a big chunk of health away from your enemies.

The Death Knight's Twin Axes can be upgraded using Smithing Stones to +10 , so make sure you have a couple of those handy if you want to see its full potential.

Death Knight's Twin Axes Stat Requirements

DEX

Death Knight's Twin Axes Weapon Skill: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe

The Death Knight's Twin Axes Ash of War is Blinkbolt: Twinaxe, which cannot be changed. This weapon skill costs 8 FP to cast. Following up with a strong attack will infuse your moves with lightning with a quick spinning slash.

From a low stance, the body is transformed into a bolt of lightning and charges straight ahead at fulgurous speed. Strong attack performs a lightning-charged spinning splash.

Where To Find Death Knight's Twin Axes

To get the Death Knight's Twin Axes in Shadow of the Erdtree , you must make your way over to the Fog Rift Catacombs . To get to the location, get to the Castle Front encampment in front of Castle Ensis and head northwards, following the canyon. Once you find yourself in a forested area covered with fog, keep going until the dungeon reveals itself.

Head all the way to the end and enter the boss gate to take on the Death Knight. Beating this opponent will see the reward of the Death Knight's Twin Axes dro, ready for you to take on more challenges in the future.

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - How to Get Roar of Rugalea (Bear Roar Spell)
item.description:
When a huge piece of DLC like Shadow of the Erdtree drops for a game like Elden Ring , there are always going to be plenty of secrets to find as players discover a brand new world of possibilities. At the same time, that means there will be more powerful enemies lying in wait, and for brave players, there are always treasures to be found.

In this case, the powerful incantation that is the Roar of Rugalea is one that players should get their hands on if their build allows, and this guide will contain all the details about this particular new addition in the DLC.

Roar of Rugalea Spell Overview & Stat Requirements

An incantation of what is jokingly called "the bear communion." Channels the power of Rugalea, the great red bear.

An incantation that is more akin to the divine invocation of the hornsent than it is to the Dragon Communion. Only through desperate battle with the feral wild can one discover a god unique to oneself.

In Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , Roar of Rugalea is a new Incantation . The Incantation costs 17 FP to cast. To equip Roar of Rugalea, you must have 1 Memory Slot available.

Transform oneself into a great red bear and emit a mighty roar. Charging increases potency.

Roar of Rugalea Stat Requirements

INT

FAITH

ARC

0

14

0

Where To Find Roar of Rugalea

To get the Roar of Rugalea in Shadow of the Erdtree , you must first make your way to Scadu Altus. Once you discover where the Moorth Ruins are, search for a hidden cave northwest of it, which will lead you to the rivers below the Ancient Ruins of Ruah. Follow the river further northwest to a forested area.

This is where players will encounter the Rugalea the Great Red Bear . Just like the smaller variants, this is an opponent that hits hard and fast and can be difficult to deal with if you do not have high Poise. Make sure to stay alert when it attacks, and once it's fallen, you will be rewarded with the Roar of Rugalea.

item.title: Warframe Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Warframe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Warframe
  • Warframe Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe
  • About the Warframe Developers

Warframe is a free-to-play sci-fi action game. It actually feels like the developers worked really hard on the game, as they have thought of many features, including customization items. Below are plenty of Warframe codes for freebies as Glyphs skins and others.

Updated June 21, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've refreshed this guide, but there aren't any fresh codes to report. Keep an eye on this space for future updates.

Warframe Codes

Below, fans will find all the codes for Warframe, including a lot of Glyph codes. In the game, Glyphs are special images that players can use to personalize their profile or to distribute in the game. Glyphs can be placed on certain surfaces in the game, such as the walls of a player's base, or used as a profile picture.

Codes Checked on June 21, 2024.

How to Redeem Codes in Warframe

The process of redeeming codes is not as easy as one would expect since it is different from most other games. Therefore, if players have any difficulties, the step-by-step instructions below will help them:

  • First, visit the official promo code page on the Warframe website.
  • Then, players need to log in to their Warframe account.
  • Afterward, they should enter or copy the above-mentioned code in the Promo Code field.
  • To redeem the code, click the Submit Code button.

Warframe Tips and Tricks

  • Platinum Strategy: Invest the initial 50 platinum wisely, focusing on weapon and Warframe slots for efficient gear management.
  • Mastery Rank: Increase Mastery Rank by leveling gear and completing Mastery Tests.
  • Star Chart Priority: Systematically conquer Star Chart missions before venturing into open-world areas for better rewards later on.
  • Trading Tactics: Engage in trading when a platinum discount is available, and rely on Warframe Market for fair transactions, avoiding trade chat as a beginner.
  • Nightwave Rewards: Participate in Nightwave challenges for valuable items and rank advancement.
  • Syndicate Support: Join syndicates for passive reputation gains and rewards.
  • Endo Management: Spend Endo wisely, choosing essential mods over others.
  • Premium Assistance: Consider premium boosts for faster progression, especially if time is limited.

The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe

Shooters have proven to be very diverse, from fantasy to classics like Counter-Strike , for example. For those looking to expand their gaming experience, this article will provide five enjoyable and addictive shooters like Warframe .

  • Paladins
  • Payday 2
  • Warface
  • Apex Legends
  • Overwatch 2

About the Warframe Developers

Warframe was created by the developers from Digital Extremes. This Canadian team has been making games since 1993 and has more than 200 workers. Here are some of their titles:

  • Unreal Tournament
  • Epic Pinball
  • Dark Sector
  • The Darkness II
  • Soulframe

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Where To Get The Dancer Armor Set
item.description:
When it comes to the challenge of a FromSoft game, players know that it takes more than just skills to overcome some of the tougher challenges that lie ahead. And in Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , it rings more true as the bosses and enemies are even more dangerous than before.

If you are a fan of light armor that allows for quick movement around the battlefield and have a penchant for dancing attacks, then the Dancer armor set should be high on your list of equipment to get as soon as possible. This guide will show you exactly how to do that as you continue to get stronger for the battles ahead.

Dancer Armor Set Overview: Pieces & Stats

In Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , the Dancer armor set is made up of four pieces: the Dancer's Hood, the Dancer's Dress, the Dancer's Bracers, and the Dancer's Trousers . When all four pieces are equipped, the Dancer set weight is 7.5.

The key buff from this armor set is the enhancement of the power of dancing attacks, making it a must for those who want to wield the new weapon type in the DLC.

Where To Find Dancer Armor Set Location

To get the Dancer armor set in Shadow of the Erdtree , you must make your way down south to the Cerulean Coast through the Ellac River and its networks of caves and tunnels. Once on the Southern Shore, look for the Cerulean Coast West Site of Grace on the western edge of the area, and go south to find a cave that will lead you to an island off the course.

This is where the Southern Nameless Mausoleum can be found, similar to the Blackgaol Knight in the Western Nameless Mausoleum. Within is the mini-boss Dancer of Ranah . Defeat the foe and she will drop the armor set alongside the Dancing Blade of Ranah.
